overview:
Alison Davis is currently a Managing Director of Belvedere Capital Partners II LLC, a position she has held since April 2004.

Previously, Ms. Davis served as Chief Financial Officer at Barclays Global Investors from April 2002 to March 2003. Prior to that, Ms. Davis served as senior partner and Practice Leader with A.T. Kearney from August 1993 to April 2000. Ms. Davis began her career in 1984, working until 1993, at McKinsey and Company, where she focused on the banking and financial services sectors.
